title: LA Noire - Complete Edition updated repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
 LA Noire Complete Edition 

 Repack features:

 Do not cut/recoded;
 Voice Language : English;
 Game version : 1.3.2617;
 Precracked - install and play ;
 Final size: 14.9gb ;
 Crack based on: RELOADED ;
 Operating system: Win XP SP3,Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit and 64bit);

 Split the setup files into less than less than 4.00gb chunks so that u can store it on 4 DVDx5...

 Includes access to all issued addon to LA Noire:
â€¢ 5 additional investigations - from smuggling to arson
â€¢ The Badge Pursuit Challenge - Find and collect badges to get the Button Man Detective Suit
â€¢ The Broderick Detective Suit - better protection from damage and your skills in melee
â€¢ The Sharpshooter Detective Suit - increases the accuracy of fire from rifles and pistols
â€¢ The Chicago Piano - a powerful machine, hidden in the trunk of your carINSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

 Open 'LA Noire repack Mr DJ.part1' , wait for around 1 or 2 minutes for self extractor to open, specify the directory where u want to extract the setup folder, open the extracted folder.....
 OR
 Extarct it yourself by opening any other part using 'WinRAR', open the extracted folder....

 DISABLE UR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) ,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Just Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided)

 After running setup,, specify the install directory ,, install as usual,, at the end of setup Directx, visual C++ and Rockstar Social Club setup [present in Redist folder] will start ,, install them all ,, play the game from desktop shortcut using run as administrator....

 Always open the game using 'Run as administrator' to avoid any savegame/crash issue, if it still crashes, lower the graphics settings and make sure u meet the system requirements along with updated graphic card drivers for your graphics card ...

 From the launcher , u can select either the Direct x 11 version or Direct X 9 version , use dx9 version if u have a low end machine.

 When u start the game fot the 1st time , Rockstart Social Club will ask u to create an accout , just select on skip account creation, it'll ask u to create a default profile , select yes and you'll be able to play the game offline then .....

 If you are still unable to get it working, feel free to drop a private message on mypage.

 IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

 LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......

Check out my Official FB page for any help :
'Mr DJ repacks'
Like it guys to support and get updates on upcoming repacks, gaming tips and requeests
